name: Combatant Kill Dragon
description:
This world needs a new hero, and it is you! Worldwide fly terrible and bloodthirsty dragons, and no one except you can not cope with them. Do not hesitate and go on an adventure right now.
Goal of the game: to kill as many dragons as possible. Your hero will aim itself, your job at the right time to press the screen to the hero shot if you calculated the true flight path, the dragon is defeated.
